opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Robert Givens v. State of West Virginia

opinion:
358 U.S. 102

79 S.Ct. 223

3 L.Ed.2d 147

Robert GIVENS, appellant,
v.
STATE of WEST VIRGINIA.

No. 22, Misc.

Supreme Court of the United States

November 24, 1958

Robert Givens, pro se.

Messrs. W. W. Barron, Atty. Gen. of West Virginia and Fred H. Caplan and George H. Mitchell, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The appeal is dismissed. Treating the papers whereon the appeal was taken as a petition for writ of certiorari, certiorari is denied.
